cause.description:
A Hand Hug is a unique expression of love. It's basically a hug given with your hand by wrapping your thumb around another person's hand. It's different from a regular hug because it just involves using your hand. You can give a Hand Hug to your friends, co-workers, peers, or anyone who has a hand. Hand Hugs cheer up people's days and allow you to connect with them.
1. We do not discourage a regular hug just other an alternative way of hugging people.
2. You can not properly Hand Hug yourself.
cause.mission: To spread the love of a Hand Hug to everyone!
cause.name: Hand Hug
